name: Underwater RPG
description:
- Underwater RPG -

The game is an rpg set in an underwater world. You have a main  city of Ravis protected under a strong bubble dome and a large expansive open world seabed. Explore the seabed through it's caverns, treasures, sunken ships and battle large sea monsters. 

The city of Ravis is a lively underwater city in political strife. Pick your side from the Merchant Guild, Marine Enforcers or the Old Faith church. Don't forget to explore the town and complete the side quests! And companions accompanying you will have their own character story arcs.
